result.html: Tá spiairí inár meascThere are spies amongst us.
result.ponchtml: Tá spiairí inár meascThere are spies amongst us.

result.eng: Spies were being exchanged here during the cold war.
result.ga: Bhíothas ag malartú spiairí anseo aimsir an chogaidh fhuair
result.orig: Bhíothas ag malartú spiairí anseo aimsir an chogaidh fhuair
result.html: Bhíothas ag malartú spiairí anseo aimsir an chogaidh fhuairSpies were being exchanged here during the cold war.
result.ponchtml: Ḃíoṫas ag malartú spiairí anseo aimsir an ċogaiḋ ḟuairSpies were being exchanged here during the cold war.

result.eng: The spy's duty was to keep an eye on America's business community.
result.ga: Bhí dualgas ar an spiaire súil a choinneáil ar lucht gnó Mheiriceá
result.orig: Bhí dualgas ar an spiaire súil a choinneáil ar lucht gnó Mheiriceá
result.html: Bhí dualgas ar an spiaire súil a choinneáil ar lucht gnó MheiriceáThe spy's duty was to keep an eye on America's business community.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí dualgas ar an spiaire súil a ċoinneáil ar luċt gnó ṀeiriceáThe spy's duty was to keep an eye on America's business community.

result.eng: The spy was sending reports back to Russia.
result.ga: Bhí an spiaire ag seoladh tuairiscí ar ais chun na Rúise
result.orig: Bhí an spiaire ag seoladh tuairiscí ar ais chun na Rúise
result.html: Bhí an spiaire ag seoladh tuairiscí ar ais chun na RúiseThe spy was sending reports back to Russia.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an spiaire ag seolaḋ tuairiscí ar ais ċun na RúiseThe spy was sending reports back to Russia.

result.eng: The spies were being observed for a long time.
result.ga: Bhí na spiairí á bhfaire le tamall
result.orig: Bhí na spiairí á bhfaire le tamall
result.html: Bhí na spiairí á bhfaire le tamallThe spies were being observed for a long time.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí na spiairí á ḃfaire le tamallThe spies were being observed for a long time.

result.eng: Five spies were based around the country under false names.
result.ga: Bhí cúigear spiairí lonnaithe timpeall na tíre faoi ainmneacha bréige
result.orig: Bhí cúigear spiairí lonnaithe timpeall na tíre faoi ainmneacha bréige
result.html: Bhí cúigear spiairí lonnaithe timpeall na tíre faoi ainmneacha bréigeFive spies were based around the country under false names.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí cúigear spiairí lonnaiṫe timpeall na tíre faoi ainmneaċa bréigeFive spies were based around the country under false names.

result.eng: It was no surprise at all for me that she was a spy.
result.ga: Níorbh iontas ar bith dom gur spiaire í
result.orig: Níorbh iontas ar bith dom gur spiaire í
result.html: Níorbh iontas ar bith dom gur spiaire íIt was no surprise at all for me that she was a spy.
result.ponchtml: Níorḃ iontas ar biṫ dom gur spiaire íIt was no surprise at all for me that she was a spy.

result.eng: The question that bothers the American secret services most is, where are the Russian spies?
result.ga: An cheist is mó atá ag déanamh scime do sheirbhísí rúnda Mheiriceá ná cá bhfuil na spiairí Rúiseacha
result.orig: An cheist is mó atá ag déanamh scime do sheirbhísí rúnda Mheiriceá ná cá bhfuil na spiairí Rúiseacha
result.html: An cheist is mó atá ag déanamh scime do sheirbhísí rúnda Mheiriceá ná cá bhfuil na spiairí RúiseachaThe question that bothers the American secret services most is, where are the Russian spies?
result.ponchtml: An ċeist is mó atá ag déanaṁ scime do ẛeirḃísí rúnda Ṁeiriceá ná cá ḃfuil na spiairí RúiseaċaThe question that bothers the American secret services most is, where are the Russian spies?
